db_file_path.comment: Path to the multi-filter photometry database for this field

target_lightcurve_files.comment: Paths to photometry HDF5 files for g, r, i photometry data for the primary reference, or None

target_field_id.comment: Field star ID of a specific star in the database or None

target_ra.comment: Right ascension of field centre or target in sexigesimal format, cannot be None

target_dec.comment: Declination of field centre or target in sexigesimal format, cannot be None

selection_radius.comment: Maximum radius used to select stars close to the target location

source_fluxes.comment: Measured source flux values in SDSS g, r, and i bands, in order or list with None entries

source_flux_errors.comment: Uncertainties on measured source flux values in SDSS g, r, and i bands, in order or list with None entries

blend_fluxes.comment: Measured blend flux values in SDSS g, r, and i bands, in order or list with None entries

blend_flux_errors.comment: Uncertainties on measured blend flux values in SDSS g, r, and i bands, in order or list with None entries

RC_ri_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS (r-i) colours to use for Red Clump star selection

RC_gi_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS (g-i) colours to use for Red Clump star selection

RC_gr_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS (g-r) colours to use for Red Clump star selection

RC_i_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-i magnitudes to use for Red Clump star selection

RC_r_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-r magnitudes to use for Red Clump star selection

RC_g_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-g magnitudes to use for Red Clump star selection

plot_i_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-i magnitudes to use for plots

plot_r_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-r magnitudes to use for plots

plot_g_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-g magnitudes to use for plots

plot_ri_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-i magnitudes to use for plots

plot_gr_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-r magnitudes to use for plots

plot_gi_range.comment: Minimum and maximum SDSS-g magnitudes to use for plots

add_rc_centroid.comment: Switch to add a marker for the Red Clump centroid on plots

add_blend.comment: Switch to add a marker for the blend on plots

add_source.comment: Switch to add a marker for the source on plots

add_source_trail.comment: Switch to add a marker for the source colour trail on plots

add_crosshairs.comment: Switch to add crosshairs to mark the position of the source in plots
